alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 01 at 1:38PM PDT until November 01 at 9:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County, Northwestern Nye County and Northeastern Nye County. * WHEN...From noon today to 9 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may result in reduced visibilities. A few power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult with high profile vehicles especially along east to west routes.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; Northwestern Nye County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County
